Replying to @_baxuz 2020-03-02 19:14
@_baxuz @kentcdodds @sarah_edo Thats' a great question! Caching is hard. Especially when there are many servers or layers in the infrastructure. Setting rules for what gets cached vs what needs to be fresh, and how to invalidate and update on changes is tough. Ability to cache everything per deploy is a win!
